description.text: Upon joining West Pier Studio, I was given the chance to lead the development of a robust vehicle customization system in Unreal Engine 5. This was an attempt in trying to get visibility and acquire clients to co-develop AAA games.
As part of the process, I gained experience in:

items: Developing a full vehicle customization system (Parts, colors, liveries).
Implementation of blueprints that allow designers to easily create vehicle parts (Adding functionalities such as part/color/livery swap thanks to actor components) and add them to the game.
Designed and implemented custom UI widgets, including a carousel system.
Developed a custom UI navigation system that works with gamepads controls.
Implemented a custom camera view systems for free-look, rotation, and UI-contextual focus views.
Collaborated with designers to streamline workflows for asset imports, proxy models, and menu flows.
Built Unreal Engine 5 from source, creating a portable version with integrated PS5 build tools to support platform-specific development.
